text: Michael Nutt is a male Irish international lawn bowler. ==Profile== He was born in 1966 and won the bronze medal in the fours with Noel Graham, Neil Booth and Jim Baker at the 2002 Commonwealth Games in Manchester. He bowls for the Old Bleach Bowling Club and was the National triples champion in 2001 and 2019. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1966 births Category:Bowls players at the 2002 Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls Category:Male lawn bowls players from Northern Ireland Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for Northern Ireland
title: Michael Nutt
